content: lovely knitted headband knitted flat and seamed size adult skill level intermediate **now available in french thanks to maud** https //bingetricot com/2020/11/23/woven-cable-headband-priscillia-uloho-modele-tricot-francais/ **now available in italian thanks to lisa of crochetromance** https //www filatiromance com/smartblog/39/fascia-multitreccia--schema-scritto html **also available in german thanks to sarah spreepiratin ** **now available in danish thanks to marianneho ** now available in spanish thanks to maya dols** **note you can sell finished items made from this pattern but please do not resell the pattern thank you
